title: Morning Yoga and Mindfulness Session
description: Start the day with a guided yoga flow and breathing exercises on the campus lawn.

title: Intro to Blockchain Technology
description: Overview of blockchain fundamentals, smart contracts, and decentralized applications.

title: Basketball Intra-Campus Tournament
description: Round robin tournament between campus halls. Register your team at the sports desk by Feb 19.

title: Creative Writing Open Mic
description: Share your poetry, short stories, or spoken word pieces with the campus community.

title: Climate Change Panel Discussion
description: Faculty and student activists discuss sustainable practices and campus green initiatives.

title: Resume and LinkedIn Workshop
description: Practical workshop on crafting standout resumes and optimizing your LinkedIn profile for recruiters.

title: African Drumming Cultural Night
description: Live drumming performances and dance showcasing traditional rhythms from across the continent.

title: Data Structures Study Bootcamp
description: Intensive peer-led review of trees, graphs, and dynamic programming ahead of midterm exams.

title: Campus Photography Exhibition
description: Student photographers showcase their best shots from the past semester in the main hall gallery.

title: Football Five-a-Side League
description: Weekly five-a-side matches on the main pitch. All skill levels welcome, just show up and play.

title: Entrepreneurship Pitch Night
description: Students pitch their business ideas to a panel of judges and alumni investors for seed funding.

title: Mental Health First Aid Training
description: Certified training session on how to recognize and respond to mental health crises among peers.

title: Campus Radio Launch Party
description: Celebrate the launch of the new student-run campus radio station with live DJ sets and giveaways.

title: Coding Interview Prep Session
description: Mock coding interviews with senior students covering LeetCode patterns and whiteboard problem solving.

title: Nutrition and Healthy Eating Seminar
description: Campus dietitian shares practical tips on eating well on a student budget throughout the semester.

title: French Language Exchange Meetup
description: Conversational French practice session pairing fluent speakers with beginners in a relaxed setting.

title: UI and UX Design Workshop
description: Hands-on Figma session covering wireframing, prototyping, and usability testing principles.

title: Campus Sustainability Fair
description: Stalls from eco-focused student clubs, upcycling demos, and a zero-waste pledge campaign.

title: Debate Club Practice Round
description: Practice session on the motion: remote work does more harm than good for university graduates.

title: Swimming Gala Qualifiers
description: Qualifying heats for the inter-university swimming gala. Students must pre-register with the sports office.

title: Artificial Intelligence Ethics Forum
description: Open forum exploring bias in AI systems, data privacy concerns, and the role of regulation in tech.

title: Community Volunteer Day
description: Campus-wide volunteer initiative supporting local schools with tutoring, painting, and resource donations.

title: End of February Bonfire Social
description: Outdoor bonfire evening to wrap up the month. Bring snacks, meet new people, and enjoy live acoustic sets.
